org.sindice.siren.util

Class ReusableCharArrayReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.CharArrayReader
        • org.sindice.siren.util.ReusableCharArrayReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public class ReusableCharArrayReader
extends CharArrayReader
    Implementation of the CharArrayReader that allows to reset the reader to a new char array input.
